constraint: The email shall not contain a space character.
The email shall not start with a @ character.
The email shall have exactly one @ character.
If the email contains a @ character, then the email shall include a dot character (.) after the @ character but before the end.
function:
def this_function(s: str) -> bool:
    ''' Check if the email contains a @ character, then the email shall include a dot character (.) after the @ character but before the end.'''
    if '@' in s:
        at_index = s.index('@')
        # Check if there is a dot after the @ and before the end of the string
        return '.' in s[at_index+1:]
    return True  # If there is no @, the condition is trivially satisfied
